meta_description: Located in Memphis, Dixon Gallery & Gardens is a fine art museum and public garden with innovative programs in the arts and horticulture. Visit us today!
hours_text:
# Hours & Admission

## Museum & Garden Hours

**Tuesday - Friday** 10 am - 5 pm

**Third Thursdays** 10 am - 8 pm

**Saturday** 10 am - 5 pm

**Sunday** 1 pm - 5 pm

**Closed Mondays**

## Business Office Hours

**Monday - Friday** 9 am - 5 pm

## Special Hours

### Holiday Hours

The Dixon is closed on the Fourth of July, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Eve at 2PM, Christmas Day, and New Year's Day.

## Admission is free

Admission to the Dixon Gallery and Gardens is now free, for good! Enjoy the gardens in all seasons and explore the galleries often. With this gift to our community, the Dixon will continue to depend on the support of our members, donors, and friends. Share the Dixon message and become a member. 

## Visiting Guidelines

[View PDF](https://www.dixon.org/media-library/Rules-for-visiting-the-galleries-and-gardens-updated9-9-22.pdf)

Watch Video  En Español 

## Support art and garden access for all!

[Become a Dixon Member](https://www.dixon.org/membership)

## See our Photo Policy

[ Photography Policy ](https://www.dixon.org/photography-policy)

## A Blue Star Museum

The Dixon is a Blue Star Museum, a program offered by the National Endowment for the Arts, Blue Star Families, the Department of Defense, and more than 2,000 museums across America to provide free admission to the nation’s active-duty military personnel and their families, including National Guard and Reserve. The Dixon is grateful to our supporters, donors and members that make free admission for...

accessibility_text:
# Accessibility

The Dixon is committed to making its collection, buildings, programs, and services accessible to all audiences.

  * Wheelchairs are available free of charge when you visit.
  * Service animals are permitted inside the museum and gardens. Service animals are working animals; pets are not allowed. _Please note that Emotional Support Animals are not permitted._  

  * With the redesign of its website, the museum has committed to adhering to ADA standards for web accessibility.

# Accessibility

# Beauty inside and out

The Dixon Gallery and Gardens offers inspiring exhibitions, exquisite gardens, events, and programs with a fresh perspective for the whole family. 

[Become a Member](https://www.dixon.org/membership)

[ Our Story ](https://www.dixon.org/our-story)
